system.description: By attuning yourself to a freestanding structure you can create a damaging vibration within it. The vibration deals 2d10 points of damage per round to the structure (hardness has no effect). You can limit the duration at casting; otherwise it lasts 1 round/level. If the target is not freestanding, surrounding stone dissipates the effect and no damage occurs. Cannot affect creatures (including constructs). The structure gets no save.
